tutorial.speak:
Let's import your data from Breeze Church Management into B1.church Admin. First, log into your Breeze account and click the settings gear icon in the upper right corner.
From the dropdown menu, select the settings option to manage your organization.
In the left sidebar, click on Export to access the data export options.
Click the Select Data to Export dropdown and choose People, then click the Export button. This will download your people data as an Excel file.
Next, return to the Select Data to Export dropdown and choose Tags, then click Export to download your tags data.
Finally, select Contributions from the dropdown and click Export to download your giving data. You now have three Excel files: People, Tags, and Contributions.
On your desktop, locate the three exported files. Select all three files by highlighting them together.
Right-click on the selected files and choose Compress on Mac, or Send to Compressed folder on Windows. This creates a zip file containing all three exports.
Now log into B1.church Admin. Click on Settings in the left sidebar.
In the Settings page, click on Import/Export button in the upper right corner.
The Import/Export tool will open in a new window. Click the Choose One dropdown under Step 1 - Import Source.
Select Breeze Import Zip from the dropdown options.
Click the Upload button and select the zip file you created in step 8. B1 will process your Breeze data and convert it automatically.
Once uploaded, review the preview of your imported data. Check that the people, households, and other information looks correct, then scroll to the bottom and click Continue.
In Step 3 - Choose Export Destination, open the dropdown and select B1 Database. This will import your data directly into your B1 church database.
Review the summary showing how many people, households, groups, and other items will be imported. When ready, proceed to Step 4.
Step 4 shows the Export Progress. You'll see checkmarks appear as each type of data is imported: Campuses, Services, Times, People, Photos, Groups, Group Members, Donations, Attendance, Forms, Questions, Answers, and Form Submissions. Wait for the process to complete. The message says: This process may take some time. It is important that you do not close your browser until it has finished.
When all items show checkmarks and the import is complete, click the Go to B1 button in the upper right to return to your B1.church Admin dashboard. Your Breeze data is now successfully imported into B1.
